code: public Authentication toAuthentication(Subject subject) {     if (subject == null || subject.getPrincipals().size() == 0) {         return null.     }     Set<Authentication> authentications = subject.getPrincipals(Authentication.class).     if (authentications.size() > 0) {         // just return the first one         return authentications.iterator().next().     } else {         return convertToAuthentication(subject).     } }
